definition: to raise one's head and look into the distance/fig. to forward to/to long for
to stick up/to rise on one end/to tilt
outstanding/to raise
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: She raised her head to see off her son, her eyes blurred with tears.
sentences.chinese: 翘望着儿子远行的背影，泪水模糊了她的双眼。
